scripts.check:coverage: istanbul-combine -d coverage-merged -p detail -r html -r json coverage-*/coverage-final.json && istanbul check-coverage ./coverage-merged/coverage-final.json --statements 99 --branches 94 --functions 99 --lines 99
scripts.start:bridging: cd ./lib/safe-contracts && npm i || true && cd ../../ && bash ./scripts/setup-foreign-chain.sh && node ./scripts/setup-bridging-contracts.js &
scripts.start:blockchain:client:both: CHAIN_ID=$CHAIN_ID_1 npm run start:blockchain:client & sleep 1 && CHAIN_ID=$CHAIN_ID_2 npm run start:blockchain:client:2
scripts.flatten:contracts: mkdir -p ./build/flattened/ && steamroller contracts/colonyNetwork/IColonyNetwork.sol > build/flattened/flatIColonyNetwork.sol && steamroller contracts/colony/IColony.sol > build/flattened/flatIColony.sol && steamroller contracts/reputationMiningCycle/IReputationMiningCycle.sol > build/flattened/flatIReputationMiningCycle.sol && steamroller contracts/colony/IMetaColony.sol > build/flattened/flatIMetaColony.sol && steamroller contracts/common/IRecovery.sol > build/flattened/flatIRecovery.sol && steamroller contracts/common/IEtherRouter.sol > build/flattened/flatIEtherRouter.sol
scripts.test:reputation:1: npm run start:blockchain:client && npx hardhat test ./test/reputation-system/*.js --network development
scripts.test:reputation:2: npm run start:blockchain:client && npx hardhat test ./test/reputation-system/reputation-mining-client/* --network development
scripts.test:reputation:1:anotherChain: CHAIN_ID=101010101 npm run start:blockchain:client && MINING_CHAIN_ID=101010101 CHAIN_ID=101010101 npx hardhat test ./test/reputation-system/*.js --network development
scripts.test:reputation:2:anotherChain: CHAIN_ID=101010101 npm run start:blockchain:client && MINING_CHAIN_ID=101010101 CHAIN_ID=101010101 npx hardhat test ./test/reputation-system/reputation-mining-client/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts: npm run start:blockchain:client && npx hardhat test ./test/contracts-network/* ./test/packages/* --network development

scripts.test:contracts:bridging:2: CHAIN_ID_1=265669101 CHAIN_ID_2=265669100 npm run start:blockchain:client:both && HARDHAT_FOREIGN=true MINING_CHAIN_ID=265669100 CHAIN_ID=265669101 npx hardhat test ./test/cross-chain/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts:bridging:1:coverage: CHAIN_ID=265669101 npm run start:blockchain:client:2 && HARDHAT_FOREIGN=false MINING_CHAIN_ID=265669100 npx hardhat --show-stack-traces coverage --solcoverjs ./.solcover.crosschain.js --temp build-coverage --testfiles './test/cross-chain/**/*'
scripts.test:contracts:bridging:2:coverage: CHAIN_ID=265669100 npm run start:blockchain:client:2 && HARDHAT_FOREIGN=true MINING_CHAIN_ID=265669100 CHAIN_ID=265669101 npx hardhat coverage --solcoverjs ./.solcover.crosschain.js --temp build-coverage --testfiles './test/cross-chain/**/*'
